text: Just want to confirm, for the Salesforce / HubSpot connector, the "Allocated to HubSpot" setting is simply saying how much of the "Total Limit" HubSpot is allowed to use correct? so if someone had 1,000,000 the setting would say how much of that 1,000,000 HubSpot can make use of.
Hi someone knows how  to get information about email campaign in sftp without use API HubSpot. I try to save the information in other CRM
